*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, April 4, 1830. Agreement to give certain lands to Williams.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Memorandum */p* '
*p*In consideration of the friendship, I have for *person_mentioned*S. M Williams*/person_mentioned*, and also as a compensation for the general services he has rendered the *person_mentioned*inhabitants of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*for many years while *person_mentioned*secretary */person_mentioned*and for which he has not received a full compensation in proportion to his merits. I have agreed to give to said *person_mentioned*S. M. Williams*/person_mentioned* the *location_mentioned*half of the premium land*/location_mentioned* which may be coming to me as *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*in the Colony of one hundred families */location_mentioned*which I Contracted with Govt, in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">eighteen hundred and twenty seven*/date_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*East side of Colorado above the San Antonio road,*/location_mentioned* but the said *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*is to attend to all the business and do all the writing and I reserve the right of locating land in that *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*under titles which I may purchase from *person_mentioned*Mexicans */person_mentioned*or others who have any right to acquire lands there—I give this as a memorandum of the understanding on this subject for said *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*security in case of my death— *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-04-1830">4 day of April 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*A true Copy. "verbatim et literatim et punctuatim"*/p*
*/div1*
